Text: This contains Skidrow crack already set up btw so you can use launcher to change the language as well. just run in admin.
Don't forget to comment if this works for you so others will know it fixes the crash dump error.

I just finished downloading and I can report that it works just fine on my laptop with integrated graphics.

Thanks so much. I'll be seeding the shit out of this.

I got the crash dump error, but I managed to make the game work.

After extracting the game, you have to open the DirectXRedist folder (which is into the Scribblenauts folder) and look for a file called DXSETUP.exe - you install it, and that should make the game work :)

Hope it's helpful!
